_aChangeLog.text: Addressing issue of custom bots not working in CS:Source

_aLatestUpdates._sText:
As of 2018, CS:Source has some how broken or was altered by Devs.

The game no longer reads .vpk files for custom bots.

So, read your copy of the original botprofile.db (in Notepad) and alter your scripts to use default bot names :)

_aChangeLog.text: .7z download file has 4 updated files and 1 new file.

_sText:
03/25/2016
R*A*S Turkey*Raptor
turkey.raptor@gmx.com

Working Custom Bots for (Steam):

Counter-Strike: Source

 \cstrike\custom\bots.vpk

 \cstrike\cfg\bccbot.cfg  //sample bot config.
      \bccbott.cfg //sample bot config.

 Path for all included files, except bots.vpk, is \cstrike\cfg\

Counter-Strike: Condition Zero

 \Half-Life\czero\botprofile.db
   \bots.vpk
   \bccbot.cfg
   \bccbott.cfg

 \Half_Life\platform\botprofile.db
      \bots.vpk
      \bccbot.cfg
      \bccbott.cfg

To add custom bots to your game:

 Press ` key for console.
 Console command:  exec bccbot.cfg
 or add command to your config file(s).
 exec bccbot.cfg when playing as CT.
 exec bccbott.cfg when playing as T.

 ***NOTE*** I have updated the .7z file with loads
   more files/scripts:

 You will be able to press F11 in-game to configure settings
 and kick bots (bot_kick). Press "p" to pause the server/game
 and then run scripts and configure settings at your leisure.
 Read the contents of csscstm.cfg to see your key bindings.

 BE SURE to try class-bots:
 Player(s) plus 6 bots per team, 1 for each weapon class.
 Console exec classbot.cfg or press DOWNARROW on your keyboard.

ALSO: This botprofile.db can be used for CS:GO.
To work as expected, just correct some of the
weapon entity names to the newer GO versions.
For example: WeaponPreference ssg08 (instead of scout).
You can find the weapon names in your CSGO autobuy.txt file.

 \csgo\cfg\botprofile.db

NOTE: Skill Template Difficulty can be changed.
This determines the mix of bots you get simply
by choosing your preferred bot difficulty
setting. I recommend most players run as-is with
bot_difficulty 2 (0/1/2/3) for best experience.
Bots will be selected from VeryHard, Hard and
Tough skill templates. You can include harder
bots that use my custom skill templates if you
change the Template Difficulty to EXPERT+HARD.
